website_summaries.verdict: If you don't want to pay the price of the top-of-the-line models, this is the next best alternative.
pros: Boasts sound, vibration, and lights to wake children, even those that sleep deeply
cons: Clip is a bit awkward for children to use without the help of an adult

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at the success of my child
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at first, I am now amazed at the success my child has experienced with this alarm. My 7-year-old son has struggled with bed-wetting for years. It’s something that has bothered him and embarrassed him, even when he wears pull ups. I bought this with very low hopes that it would help, but I thought I’d try. Amazing after seven weeks, the bedwetting stopped completely and he continued to have no accidents. Take my suggestion if your child is a bedwetter buy this alarm.
customer_reviews.author: KimYea

customer_reviews.title: Really, Really, Really Love the Chummie Alarm! It's an Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: SO EXCITED WITH THE POSITIVE RESULTS that I had to write a review. Our 8-year-old son had only been dry at night a couple of times in his life. Chummie bedwetting alarm has been awesome but you have to commit and follow the instructions. For the first week, I slept in his room to help wake him up then the alarm trained his brain to get up as soon as it started making sound and then he started responding before it even made an alert sound. It's been less than a month straight of dry nights and we're so proud of our son and he's so proud of himself. We can say based on our experience that Chummie really works!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did it’s job. I made my child use it for at least 2 weeks without any incidents before we went without. Much better than spending probably thousands at a specialist for bed wetting.
customer_reviews.author: mmnadiggs

customer_reviews.title: 100% success for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Our 10-year-old son has been a bedwetter his entire life. Prior to purchasing the Chummie premium bedwetting alarm, he had had maybe very few dry nights in his entire life, and those seemed to be random. He would wake up soaked, having slept through emptying his bladder multiple times throughout the night. He has worn this alarm for little more than a month and a half and is consistently getting up to go to the bathroom and remaining dry throughout the night. This is an awesome alarm that has worked 1oo% for him. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We had been trying all kinds of things for 2 years until we found this. Our child was trained in two nights. Best part he loved wearing this and claiming his star every morning. One trick, put a diaper on top of the underpants and the alarm. That prevents the pants from getting wet. When an accident does happen it will wet the underpants and pants.
customer_reviews.author: Sudeep Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a week. Only problem is when sweating i gives a false positieve. Otherwise top product !
customer_reviews.author: Bramatus

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I came across Chummie
customer_reviews.text: Chummie Premium Bedwetting Alarm has successfully worked for our ten-year-old very deep sleeper son. We'd been using Pull-Ups for long time, but I realized it was time to find a permanent solution for it. On our doctor’s suggestion we bought this particular alarm. He was adamant about Chummie, and the good reviews convinced me to purchase it. I was thrilled to find out that after a mohth my son was fully trained and completely started getting up dry. He was no longer wetting the bed and I did not have to start my washing machine in the morning. I have no idea how this works, but it does. Amazing product. 5-stars!
customer_reviews.author: SamMendes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 boys ages 7, 6, and 4. We have a large family history of hereditary bed wetting, so I fully expected this to take 6+ months to work, if at all. All my Boys are heavy, deep sleepers and Chumi worked like a champ. My oldest was fully potty trained within 2 months of using Chumi. He was old enough that he could put on and take it off on his own. It’s been wonderful and my middle son is begging to start his turn. I fully expect it to be successful with all 3 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: The Chummie bedwetting alarm literally saved me from washing a load of dirty bedsheets every morning and my little 8-year-old son to feel bad for his nighttime wetting until we bought this alarm, we used night time diapers but does any child who is 8-year-old wants to wear diapers? So, we finally bought this alarm and in less than two months of use, he went from 2 accidents a night to completely accident-free. From then on, he has been dry every single night. Never one accident. It's been a month and counting. I know that every kid is different but we are thrilled with the results and would recommend this alarm for the child who wants to be diaper free.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Chummie Premium is fantastic and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: It worked! It took my nine-year-old son about three weeks. I helped him in the first week to set up the alarm and waking him up and after that he would do it himself. The alarm itself is loud and the sensor is very sensitive as it only takes a couple of drops of water to activate the alarm. Eventually the alarm stopped him from peeing in the bed and he learned to hold his pee. It has woken our son up even though he was a deep sleeper. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone struggling and teaching an older child learning to potty train at night.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Item worked well but very sensitive. The alarm would go off sometime even when dry. We solved the problem by putting one square of toilet paper between the sensor and child's skin. Never went off unexpectedly again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tanga

customer_reviews.title: Night time peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why we waited so long to buy the Chummie bedwetting alarm. This alarm helped our deep sleeper 7-year-old child tremendously. I became sick and tired of washing sheets every day and I couldn't find anything to help him stop. I decided to get on Amazon and search out alarms and came across this one. Six weeks of accidents and then that was it. She has had some nights where he seemed to leak small amounts and then gets up to use the bathroom but after a few nights the result was good. I would say it was a wise investment for our family and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieShue

customer_reviews.title: Chummie Alarm Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Our son who is little more than 8 years is a bedwetter from his childhood. Me and my husband were becoming helpless as we tried many approaches to stop his wetting but the result was always negative, finally as a last try when we used the Chummie Premium Bedwetting Alarm and he went from wetting the bed every night to being dry every night in only six weeks. We used it a for one extra week to make sure the connection between his brain and full bladder were well enforced. Chummie does the job well and we are amazed.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisNoh

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchasing defective Chummy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Chummy as my friend had a good experience. We had reservations because of the $100 price tag. Wish I would have listened to my gut and not purchased this defective item. I purchased this early August, and 5 days after the return period was over, our Chummy broke. The alarm goes off whenever we plug in the wire to the device. It’s not wet, so clearly it’s malfunctioning. Unfortunately, we spent $100 on this for nothing. Our child is still wetting the bed, we have a defective chummy and no way to contact seller since the return period is over. Regretting our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: My son 9-year-old son has struggled with bed-wetting for years that has bothered him and embarrassed him. Nothing seemed to work. I bought the Chummie Premium Bedwetting Alarm with very little hope that it would help, but I thought I’d try. After two weeks, the bedwetting stopped completely! This is how it worked. The alarm senses moisture, even small amount, and gives off a loud alarm with vibration designed to wake the child. Over time, the child's body learns to associate waking up with the feeling of a full bladder and will wake the child up before the wetting accident. If you are having a bedwetting child just try this alarm it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ValarieTong

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Worked great son stopped wetting the bed after a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Worked Until We Tried This!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a last-ditch effort for our eight-year-old struggling with bedwetting. We were reluctant to try the alarm and thought he'd never be dry. we bought this alarm and he is now completely dry after three weeks! Alarm taught hims to keep dry and maybe slept a little less deeply because he was subconsciously waiting to be awoken by the alarm. It worked like a magic for him and he started getting up before even the alarm would ring. Overall it was worth the cost, effort and time. He is dry now, which saves all sorts of headaches and laundry. And we no longer need to buy pullups!!
customer_reviews.author: JaimeM

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!! I read some reviews that the sensor would go off when no moisture had touched it, but honestly thought it was user error. Not the case! I had the device sitting on my bed— nothing touching it. I was just reading the instructions— and the alarm kept going off! Then that night it kept making sounds when my son was wearing it and wasn’t peeing. I removed it from his underwear, but my tired brain forgot to turn it off— the alarm started going off an hour later when it was sitting on the counter! Frustrated that I can’t return it— do yourself a favor and save the hassle!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom25Kids

customer_reviews.title: Chummie worked very  well for my older child
customer_reviews.text: We used the Chummie alarm with our son who peed the bed basically every night for 10 years. After a bumpy first four weeks, he has been consistently dry for the past 2 weeks. He now gets up and goes to the bathroom every night and he is so proud of himself. He had his first sleepover last weekend too!!!, I can only say that he is happy and I am relieved and grateful. THIS PRODUCT WILL HELP YOUR CHILD SLEEP DRY! Absolutely worth the money! Get the Chummie. Its a life saver
customer_reviews.author: AndySchmidt

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: We have had some success with the Chummie. It certainly wakes my son up, and he is a heavy sleeper. He doesn't always get out of bed immediately, but the alarm and vibrations stop him from urinating any more. The sensor detects liquid very well, which can be a pain in the middle of the night, but it needs to in order to accomplish the goal. The only thing that gets in the way is the cord. My son can turn over and disconnect the sensor. The Chummie gives a continuous beep when this happens, which distinguishes it from the 'wet' beep, but it's pretty startling. An uncorded sensor would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Its tough getting up when it goes off every night but it definetly solved my sons bedwetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Update: my son as has been using this product for 5 1/2 months. I'm so happy to say, he no longer wakes up wet! I highly recommend this product. After our little hiccup with it (read below) it works! I'm torn. It worked great for 8 weeks, then stopped. Will not detect fluids on sensor pad anymore. Not worth $80 if it only works for a short period. Update: customer service called me and resolved my issue. We will be happily using this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Extremely happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this amazing product! I was skeptical at first and didn't think it would help my son who is a heavy sleeper and is very hard to wake him but once we bought it, the device started helping him almost immediately. The first week, he had some accidents but did great! By the sixth week he was staying dry every night. He stayed dry for 2 straight weeks. He did have an accident in the third week but now he gets up on his own through the night to go to the bathroom. We are so pleased with these results and so is our son. The key is your child has to be ready.
customer_reviews.author: KellyPeters

customer_reviews.title: not detect urine unless he urinates directly on it.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried this Chummie Bedwetting Alarm for over a month now and it hasn't worked for us. We tested the alarm with water and it goes off but when my son wets the bed his underwear, pj pants, and sheets are all soaking up the moisture of the pee for the alarm to go off. I don't know if it he would need to pee right on it to work but it hasn't gone off at night ever and we have a very wet bed most nights. I am sad we purchased this alarm I had very high hopes because I have a pre teen who is tired of bedwetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY - DON'T BUY FROM CHUMMIE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Chummie Premium Bedwetting Alarm from Amazon. I used it for about a month and a half before the sensor stopped working and no longer senses moisture. I registered my product and contacted Chummie twice via their website and have gotten no response. Now the 3 month "warranty" is about to expire and they are not honoring their "warranty". First of all, a 3 month warranty for something that the instructions manual says can take 6 months or more to fully work is not adequate to begin with, but it is even worse that they are not providing any customer service at all or honoring the stated warranty! DON'T BUY FROM CHUMMIE!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Milde

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my son
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is a great idea, however it is super sensitive! It went off all night even though my son was not wetting the bed. I think the problem is that it detects any moisture so sweat for example sets it off. I tried to give it some time it’s been almost a month now but it just has not worked for us. Disappointing because it’s not cheap either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed it didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this and thought for sure we'd have success. However, in the end, it was a very frustrating device as we got a lot of false alarms. My son would put this on and it would start going off right away. We would adjust with no real change. We never put it on or against his skin. In the end, he found it frustrating because it would keep him up while he was trying to fall asleep. We've abandoned this device and have decided to try a different one and will see how that goes soon!
customer_reviews.author: TA.D

customer_reviews.title: Defective alarm
customer_reviews.text: This alarm was a waste of money! At first it worked great and then out of nowhere, it started going off for no reason. I dried the alarm and let it sit unused for a few days since every time we would plug the sensor into the alarm it would go off immediately. Obviously this rendered it unusable after only 5 weeks of use. I ordered another set of sticky adhesive tabs so I’ve wasted even more money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Kortman

customer_reviews.title: Not super loud!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about 2 months now. My child is a VERY DEEP SLEEPER and the first few nights it didn't even wake him up. I almost gave up on it, but we kept trying. After he wore it a few more times he started waking up most of the time. He does have a lot of dry nights now, so it has definitely helped. Apparently it just takes longer for some to be really consistent than others. I am glad we tried it though, because it has definitely helped!
customer_reviews.author: sherry l.

customer_reviews.title: Had no idea!!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t know what else to do. Our pediatrician suggested a drug therapy. We said not yet. Lets try this.Wow! 6 weeks later my son (12 years old) was extremely disappointed to find a dime sized wet spot on the bed. He had a streak going-8 days in a row dry- he hadn’t even had the alarm on the last five nights. This device is a god-send. I would recommend it to all parents who have a bedwetter. Our boy never had a daytime accident, but we couldn’t get him through two consecutive dry nights. This has been awesome- we are so proud of our son taking this big(for him!)step to maturity. Well worth the cost. Its unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Simply Didn’t Work (For Us)u
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews, and thought this would be great! But it simply did not work for us. Sigh. I will be returning and requesting a refund. The alarm is loud. The vibration is decent, but the system as a whole just didn’t work for us. The entire house wakes up, but not the child.....
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Good bedwetting solution
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small, but effective alarm has changed my son's life for the better! He has now been without his alarm for about a week and no longer wets the bed at all. It taught him how to recognize when he had to go potty and I no longer have to even wake him up to go, he does it on his own. This alarm has been a miracle worker for us and to make it even better my son loves to wear it because it gave him peace of mind and made him feel like a confident big boy.
customer_reviews.author: David Noe

customer_reviews.title: It breaks within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Got no response from company when complained that it was malfunctioning. Trying to use even though broken and it keeps on breaking down more and more. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift from my mother for my 7-year-old deep sleeper son who would wet his bed nearly every night. This alarm is amazing and it took just four weeks to work. It definitely trained the brain of my child to receive signals from bladder. It saved me from the misery of washing sheets one to two times a night down to once in the first week and no washing the urine-soaked sheets after the second week. Going to recommend this to everybody with bedwetting kids.
customer_reviews.author: sduski

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 2 weeks of use!
customer_reviews.text: We paid $89 for this product. We used it for less than 2 weeks before it quit working. We replaced the batteries in hopes that would help. It did not. When I went to try and return faulty product, I learned that there are no returns allowed. Basically, we just wasted $89. Don't waste yours. Update: they reached out to us to send back in and said ours had water damage and rust?!?!? We had it for one week and it had rust?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Rynoman

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dollars I have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: My deep sleeper son is nine and after 3 weeks is dry at night for the 1st time ever! I tried the other methods before after a few months we gave up and went back to leaking, expensive pull-ups. He'd sleep through all other methods and showed no result at all. When I first purchased this product, I wasn’t sure it would work, but after just a few weeks I saw a great improvement. The alarm is fairly loud so it woke both of us up, and for that reason it trained both of us. This alarm resolved the bed wetting completely in about two months. Great product, would recommend if you are having bed wetting child.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Slow but steady progress.  Device broke, but customer service was top notch.
customer_reviews.text: We're making progress. My daughter sleeps like the dead, and even if the alarm goes off instead of having a dry night, she gets up right away now so it's definitely helping. After about a month of use, the wire snapped right off the plug and we learned we were 8 days past our 30 day order window for returns. The Chummie customer service rep was super helpful and is mailing us a new device today. So mixed feelings since it broke, but pleased the issue is getting resolved. I'm confident this device will work over time.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t understand all of the positive reviews for this product. The sensor did not stay attached to the underwear, even with 3-4 pieces of adhesive. The cord consistently came out of the device overnight rendering the unit completely useless. We purchased the armband and that was useless too- the device fell out of the armband every night it was used. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. The customer care of the makers of the product did not act in an understanding and upright way concerning the product. It was very difficult to understand the directions. There were no diagrams with numbers or letters to help parents. It was a total waste of time and money. After speaking to my child's pediatrician we have decided to go another route. A higher quality product with great costumer care, on the part of the maker of the product, is very important to our family.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Defective but can’t return
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective. It won’t shut off at all. Continues to beep even when it’s not wet and it’s not returnable. I was so excited to get my son trained. Only used 2 nights and it will not shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Radlinski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing-it worked for my 8 year old daughter exactly as described. She went from wetting the bed 2x every night (even after withholding liquids 2 hours before bedtime) to being accident free for almost 6 months now. I've also can't say enough about their customer service; I recently starting using it to help my 6 year old daughter, but the sensor stopped working. Customer service was excellent and, because I owned the product, replaced and shipped the sensor for free, with absolutely no hassle. Highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Pull-Ups!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how this would work, but my child went from being every single night wetter, to diaper less and dry within two months. The first two weeks she would completely wet the bed. The third week onwards there was a big turnabout she would get up and use the bathroom. The last week she stopped wetting at all and began to sleep through the night and only gets up to pee in the morning! If you have a bedwetting child give this alarm a try! I am so glad we did!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryShepherd

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results and Amazing Device
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the Chummie premium Bedwetting Alarm is fantastic! It is exactly what I expected it to be. It probably took 7 weeks total, for my 8-year-old daughter with the bulk of the accidents being the first week and faster recovery in the next week and no accidents after that. The sensors react immediately to moisture that helped my daughter to wake up to the alarm. The result was fast, permanent and amazing. Highly recommend if you have a bedwetting child. The box comes with the alarm, sensor, batteries, tapes and a really pretty progress diary. Everything needed to start an excellent and effective treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who sleeps like a rock and in the last month he’s only had 2 accidents whereas he used to have 2-4 each week! Safe to safe it’s working wonders already!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Free from Bed Wetting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Chummie alarm a few months ago and the result is fantastic. I had tried everything with my seven-year-old daughter, I used to wake her up in the middle of the night and also reduced liquids at bedtime...etc., nothing worked. My frustration made me find for solutions and i found this alarm. After three weeks of continuous use, she started to hold her pee and have a dry bed and stopped using it after 4 weeks. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MaryTaylor

customer_reviews.title: My ONLY regret is that we didn't buy it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I am the mother of an 8yo who has never once been dry overnight. We tried it all- restricting fluids, waking him, and every pull-up/bed pad on the market. Nothing worked. This was a last ditch effort and it worked! My only regret is that I didn't buy it sooner. I know it's a lot of money but, you won't be disappointed. We went from soaked at night to completely dry in 4 weeks!!!! Alarm was loud enough for my very deep sleeper. We also used a pull-up over the underwear/alarm in case of accidents so we didn't have to change sheets overnight!
customer_reviews.author: NED Hudson MA

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I try this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year old so was wet every night even after multiple attempts to wake him up from potty breaks at night. no drinks after 7pm, no sodas, etc. Chummie is a little miracle worker which also boosts confidence. in short, it is a life saver! From the day we started using Chummie, it took us about 2 months to go from bed wetting to dry nights. Followed as directed and got the results that they mentioned. I am highly impressed with the Chummie alarm and would definitely recommend this alarm to any parent with a bedw etting child. This is the best investment ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter used this for 2 nights and it worked great. In the 3rd night it would not work properly. I called their customer service as instructed. The instructed me to send it to the for repair or replacement. So far have not received anything back.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 60 days and child not yet dry
customer_reviews.text: We are very disappointed that it stopped working within 60 days. My son has made some progress but is unable to stay dry. Would like to give it some more time with this product to see if it will help him further but do not want to buy another. I would recommend other brands that can last longer.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: hard to keep adhered
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super sensitive to any moisture! It works great, definitely not something you can sleep through, in fact the alarm terrified my son. He has been dry for a month now yea! But that happened because I told him he could sleep without the alarm until he had an accident and that was motivation enough to keep him dry! I had to put the tape on his underwear, then put a pull-up over the top of the underwear, otherwise it falls off
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Really worked for my son!
customer_reviews.text: This is a best addition to our family. Works just as advertised. I had grown so tired from having to do laundry every single morning due to my son's bedwetting. His sheets were soaked and the mattress was getting trashed. We bought the Chummie alarm and It was life-changing for my son who is extremely self-conscious about his bedwetting - and for me. The first week it went off when he had an accident, but he has been dry every night thereafter! Making him go to the bathroom before bed and restricting his fluid intake after 7:00 pm was not working, but adding this monitor as a third measure somehow has made all the difference!
customer_reviews.author: dutydaid

customer_reviews.title: Tape isn't secure enough.
customer_reviews.text: If your child moves a lot through the night, this will not work. Double tape doesn't keep the unit in place and it can easily slip out. For the price, this should have been made with a more secure way of securing the detector on the underwear throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t woke up my son
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The highest noise level was not enough to wake up my son twice on the same night. He is 5 years old and pis every 3 hours. I had too much hope on Chummie and nothing. Anyone with the same problem?
customer_reviews.author: Paloma

customer_reviews.title: Week One sucks
customer_reviews.text: After week one, despite changing the alarms up, my daughter ha been sleeping through the alarm with no issue :( It is super sensitive to dampness which does make it difficult to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a couple of weeks only
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it started showing results but it stopped working after a few weeks of use.. I tried to get in touch with the company which surprisingly answered quickly at first and promised me to change the sensor which was the problem, but until now nothing happened and they stopped answering me, so I will have to buy another brand because I thing the system is good, but the company failed on after-sales service.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: This product hasn’t worked right since day one. Can change the volume level because the button is too far in the unit. What a complete waste of money. Irritated there is no return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Olbinski

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design for Girls
customer_reviews.text: We bought this with the hope that it would help our 7 year out daughter get through the night without wetting the bed, but after one night she refused to use it again. The design is not ideal for girls and was likely made specifically for boys. We have since bought the Therapee product and our girl has had her first stretch of dry nights ever!! Don't buy Chummie for your daughter, get the Therapee instead. It's more expensive but worth the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Engel

customer_reviews.title: This product ROCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Chummie is amazing! My son’s pediatric nurse practitioner, convinced us to use this product, and we basically followed her advice which turned to be blessing for my son. My son had been wearing diapers at night his whole life, and never had a dry night unless I woke up three times to take him to the bathroom. now after just 2 weeks of use, he has been completely dry for 5 days in a row now! We are all getting so much more sleep, and he is so confident and proud of himself. We highly recommend this product! It worked really well, and the product itself is very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliekim

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old son was occasionally wetting the bed. We thought maybe he was going through a growth spurt and maybe he was sleeping heavier. We hoped he would grow out of it but that didn't happen. After several months without success we decided to visit the doctor who suggested us to buy a bedwetting alarm so I decided to give the Chummie a try. I was super surprised when this product literally worked for my son within days! I am happy to see him completely stop wetting the bed and finally being free of worry and loads and loads of laundry. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: OrlandosMom

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend a product like this one to help your child ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work miracles for us but we've made huge progress after using this for about 2 months. We have stopped using it because it's easier to just wake her up during a certain time of the night instead of dealing with the sensor/tape/wet linens/unexpected wake times. We are dry most nights of the weeks but occasionally still have accidents. I do recommend a product like this one to help your child break the bed wetting habit even though it's a lot of work and a lot of laundry for awhile!!! it's worth it. Our child is 7.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't believe it worked so fast on our 8 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old was wetting in a pull up EVERY NIGHT. We couldnt' figure out why, if it was laziness or a medical condition. We bought the chummie and after the 3rd day she has been dry every since (for 3 weeks so far). She says it helps her feel when she needs to go. Chummie hasn't gone off since day 3, but she's still wearing it faithfully... she actually loves chummie. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisey R

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and faulty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to assist my child with her ongoing problem. I did not like the design. It isnt comfortable for our daughter. It did work for a few weeks, but then this just kept going off without warning. We changed the battery..nothing worked. We went with another product and our daughter is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Michalene Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works with a little commitment
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this thing is working! We've been using it for one week with my 6-yr-old daughter who has never had a dry night. The first night it went off 3 times. The next 2 nights had 2 alarms apiece. After that, we had 1 alarm each night getting later and later each. Last night we had a totally dry night. We still have a ways to go to be "done", but we can already see in a week that it's working!!! Consistency with use, being prepared for the accidents, and using disposable bed pads has helped add to the success. It's a process, but thus far seems to truly be working!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Poorlyade, failed in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Device is what my child needs. The concept is spot on. It's loud and sensitive. But it failed in two weeks. For $100, the device needs to be better made. We used it everyday for two weeks and then suddenly it would go off even when dry. We needed to go out and get a new one right away because my daughter is mid training and is now sad that she may wet the bed tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about Chummie! My 8 year old son struggled with bed wetting. It was starting to be embarrassing for him. This was expensive but the reviews made it sound worth it. It totally is! We had one issue with the cord having a short or something. The alarm was going off when it definitely shouldn't have been. I called the company and they quickly sent another cord. Wonderful customer service! In just weeks my son was accident free and super proud of himself! Love this product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my grandson, 7, who still wet the bed. His bed wetting really hindered his social life, since he didn't want anyone to spend the night because he was embarrassed. I can't imagine it did much for his self-esteem either. Enter the Chummie. It started working almost immediately, waking him up when he started to wet the bed so he could go to the bathroom. He is completely accident free now, just a few weeks after starting. Wish we'd learned about this device sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are getting there...
customer_reviews.text: It’s taking a while, but my son is getting his bed wetting under control. When we first started, it was really hard. He was getting up several times a night, but now it is only once or twice. Slowly he is making progress. Every child will have a different time period of improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but WOW, it worked!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about buying this. I thought my 5 year old son is such a deep sleeper that this will never work. Boy was I wrong! The first night the alarm went off he soaked the bed. The second night, he just got his underwear wet. The third night and on, he just went one little drop. I would say it took about 3-4 weeks for him to be able to either wake up on his own to go, or even hold it all night. This is worth every penny and he is so proud of himself. This is a must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: 5-stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought the alarm for our 6-year-old because he was wetting through Goodnights every night and woke up in the morning soaked. I saw good reviews for this product and figured it was worth a shot. Well, it has been less than a week of using this wonderful little alarm and he has had 4 entirely dry nights. We will continue to use the alarm for few weeks and hope the wonderful results continue. This product is amazing and I have recommended it all the people I know with children.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great until the sensor quit working
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter used this alarm for less than a month and the sensor quit working correctly. I would plug it in and there would be no sound indicating it is working. I'd unplug it and plug it back in and it would work. But I ended up sending it back and getting a brand new sensor and it works just fine. But for how expensive it is, I was pretty upset that it had problems.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Rae 🌞

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and bulky
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to use this product with both of my girls and neither would wear it due to it being so uncomfortable between their legs, the sensor pad is quite large and when you add the tape it becomes even more bulky. When we were able to use it a few times the alarm didn't always go off when wet, overall wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Power

customer_reviews.title: The stickers are colorful with little dinosaur figures on them so it was fun for him to put them on each night and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old had a big bed-wetting problem. After his 8th birthday we got tired of putting him in GoodNights every night and still having pee-pee smelling sheets every other night as he started peeing through them. We put this on him and he was cured of the bedwetting problem in just over 3 weeks. The stickers are colorful with little dinosaur figures on them so it was fun for him to put them on each night and he didn't mind it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: While I believe this alarm COULD be helpful, the mechanism to keep it attached to your child's underwear (stickers) is worthless. 2 nights in a row my kid has been wet, because the alarm has come off of his underwear. I've seen people suggest putting on a second pair of underwear to secure them, but for $100, this alarm should be able to stay in place. A clip would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Keil

customer_reviews.title: The sensor is very sensitive so I'm glad we started it in the fall because he is ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about getting one but totally worth the money. Took a few weeks and a little getting use to it. My son is a heavy sleeper and we would have to wake him before we went to bed so he would use the bathroom and not pee his bed. The sensor is very sensitive so I'm glad we started it in the fall because he is a sweaty child and would set it off easily otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Wiesner

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend for anyone with a child that needs to learn ...
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly! I highly recommend for anyone with a child that needs to learn to stop wetting the bed. We used the double undie trick and put the chummie between them. The tape doesn't work. Follow their instructions to the T and you will have a child staying dry through the night in no time. We did take a little longer than some other reviewers. I think we took between 1-2 weeks to get it to stop going off in the middle of the night. So don't be discouraged if the alarm is still sounding after 5-7 days! Stick with it, it'll work!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Only took a week!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old really struggled with bed wetting. She sleeps so deeply, that being wet didn't wake her. The reaction is instant and the sensor is so sensitive that in just a few days she stopped having accidents! It's been three months now and she has a perfect record! Note: The alarm is horribly loud, we only used the vibration setting. My daughter wasn't thrilled about wearing it. But it worked amazingly well. I was completely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life changer. My seven yr old daughter has nighttime issues and it it 5 days a week. We have used this for a few weeks and she has actually started to just sleep through the night not setting off the alarm and waking up dry. I don't use the tape that came with the alarm. It was more like a sticker and didn't stick to fabric well. We use medical/bandaid tape and use a second pair of panties over then alarm. (Panties -tape alarm to panties - second pair of panties to keep it in place
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Single tape doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work well for us. We had to use 2 tape strips every night and it's ridiculous that we need pay more to replenish the tapes. There are cheaper and more effective options with a clip that worked better for us.
customer_reviews.author: Pine stripe

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this out for my daughter to see if it would work, because I didn't know what else to do. I have to say that this Alarm system worked absolutely wonderfully! I suggest this product to everyone who has a child that wets the bed. My child is 9 years old. It gave her so much confidence, I can't believe it. She has not wet the bed and it only took 1 week to stop wetting. We went on vacation after 2 weeks and she never wet the bed and still hasnt. It has been over a month now. You can modify to fit better, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Thee Greek Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! I got for my 7 year old, I was ready for her to be potty trained at night. At first I wasn't sure, is it really going to help us? After 2 weeks she was waking up dry in the morning, we stopped using Chummie and we are over a month of dry mornings!!! Very proud moma would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: So far this is working like a charm for our boy
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working like a charm for our boy! He has worn it 6 nights thus far and has gotten up every single night to use the restroom in the night on his own!
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Hate this product...I've had it for 2 days and Amazon wont take it back!! Its awful!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that worked!
customer_reviews.text: We tried MANY things to help our 9 y/o stop wetting the bed. This was the only thing that did it! **TIP: the tape fell off quite often when we first started so we had her wear 2 pairs of under wear and placed the sensor in between the two! It worked perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Turner

customer_reviews.title: It works! You must be consistent...
customer_reviews.text: It took about 3 weeks for my 6 year old. Now she is dry all night, she hasn't had and accident. I wish I would've done this sooner. It is difficult at first because your sleep is interrupted and you are dealing with a cranky child but worth it in the end. I offered her rewards and that helped. The tape was bothersome for my daughter so I bought some soft surgical tape and that did the trick. The sensor is very sensitive which got annoying even if she would sweat a little it would set off the alarm, but overall I am a satisfied parent!
customer_reviews.author: Wiljack

customer_reviews.title: It started working on the second night
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 12 and she has been in pull-ups her whole life after diapers. Last year, we decided that was it & got her soaker panties and a rubber mattress cover. She still wet the bed the entire year almost every night. We gave up and went back to pull ups. She's been using this with success for 3 weeks now and she is ecstatic. I am so happy we can stop buying pull ups, I wish we found out about this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: natasha purcell

customer_reviews.title: Idea is great. The flexi-tape did not stick well to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Idea is great. The flexi-tape did not stick well to my son's underwear, and would come loose and get caught on his pajama pants. The alarm works well, as long as the sensor doesn't come loose. It would be nicer if the alarm was wireless so the child had to get up to turn it off. My son would push the button to silence the alarm and unplug the sensor...just to fall back asleep and stay wet.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I can not praise this enough. My son is 5 and has wet the bed every night sometimes up to three times a night. The first few nights when the alarm woke him up it really scared him (they suggest having the volume on high at first) so I turned it down and he was better w it. Probably only had accidents for the first two weeks of using it and not every night. Only had to use it for a month and he has been accident free since! I can't praise it enough!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Harpel

customer_reviews.title: Total success - a great product and support for the entire family.
customer_reviews.text: Our experience was text book success with Chummie. Not only did we overcome bedwetting, but we helped our child gain their confidence back, express our support and love and let them know that it was never their fault. We followed the instructions on the manual in conjunction with a book called Getting to Dry. Both were extremely helpful in guiding us on the medical, physical and psychological issues related to bedwetting. Once we called the Chummy support line for advice and they were personable, helpful and extremely accommodating. If you want success - we highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miami reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old son as an alarm was recommended by his pediatrician. He was done wetting within a month and a half. The first few weeks he had to change wet underwear each night and sometimes sheets but he quickly became aware of when he had to pee during the night and woke up on his own. Very easy to use. We began using 2 strips to keep the sensor on but other than that loved this product. Should have tried it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly impressed
customer_reviews.text: So, we are only a few days in, but I'm already seeing a noticeable improvement. It wakes my 5 year old up mid pee, the bed may is barely wet at all so it's definitely doing what it's supposed to. We talked about it and how it works before he started using it, so he doesn't have a problem with having to wear it at all. Day 3, and he can already set it up himself. Even the tape. im thoroughly impressed. Will update with a full review at the end of our journey
customer_reviews.author: dominique

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved
customer_reviews.text: My son slept so deeply that bedwetting was a continued problem. While it took a week or so for him to associate the alarm with the act of wetting, he "got it" after about a week or so, and has been almost completely dry since. No more wet beds and changing the sheets in the middle of the night! Happy boy and happy parents! This product works as advertised, and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: drsharon

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This has helped us greatly! Soaking the bed is obsolete. Even if my child does not fully awake (deep sleeper), she stops urinating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clark

customer_reviews.title: It’s works
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny .. my daughter is not wetting her bed..
customer_reviews.author: Kalyan Chakravarthi Gopisetty

customer_reviews.title: Faulty alarm
customer_reviews.text: Button to set sound, lights and vibration isnt working. When alarm goes off we cannot get it to turn iff you have to take the batteries out.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Henry

customer_reviews.title: Sound sleeping 11 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Almost bought the less expensive brand. Glad I didn't. This worked great once we bought tighty, whitey underwear for my 11 year old son. He had 2 kinds of boxers, but they did work well with this device. He is a hard sleeper and suddenly started wetting the bed when he started middle school. I had to sleep in his room a few nights to help him wake up, but not for long. I wish I had bought this sooner. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: My son is so frustrated by this alarm. We ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is so frustrated by this alarm. We have another one, made by Malem, that is much more consistent and effective. I was just trying to save some money because we needed two alarms, for two boys. This one goes off and keeps going off when there isn't any urine. It has gone off for perspiration. It has come off because the clip isn't tight on clothing. My son is so ready to learn and this alarm has been a hindrance to his momentum because of its inconsistent effectiveness. Skip it and get the Malem!
customer_reviews.author: M Hammar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s great product. Somtimes it comes up done during the night when my son rolls over so it defects they purpose on those nights but for most part yes it works
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We're two weeks into using this and there have been no false alarms. We chose this one over a more expensive model that appears to do the same thing. I like that it blinks as well as vibrating and making a loud sound. Our son needs all the help he can get to wake him up to use the toilet. I would certainly recomend this alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. The stickers rarely stayed in place and my son would wake up with the probe by his arm. After one week the machine started malfunctioning and would alert for no reason. Company will not exchange. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: CONSTANT false alarms. Ridiculous for the amount of money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Chummie Premium Bedwetting Alarm for Deep Sleepers - Award Winning, Clinically Proven System with Loud Sounds, Bright Lights and Strong Vibrations, Green
product_meta.description:
Color:GreenChummie bedwetting alarms are widely recommended by pediatricians
to stop bedwetting. The Chummie alarms have won numerous awards
for their novel technology and support.


Perfect Bedwetting Alarm for Deep Sleepers
Chummie Premium Bedwetting alarm trains even the deepest sleepers
to stop bedwetting and sleep dry throughout the night in just a
few weeks without medication. As urination begins
Chummie’s patented IntelliFlex sensor detects the first
drop of urine. The alarm's patented bright light, loud sound and
strong vibration goes off to wake your child as bedwetting
occurs. Chummie teaches your child’s brain a connection
between the bladders full signal and waking. In weeks, your child
wakes sooner and sooner until he/she stops bedwetting
permanently.


Innovative One Drop Detection Sensor
The sensor is the most important elements of an effective
bedwetting alarm. Our revolutionary, patented IntelliFlex sensor
is designed to deliver results without compromising your
child’s comfort. The sensor uses advanced technology to
detect urine at the very first drop and sets off the alarm,
training your child to stop bedwetting. IntelliFlex sensor has a
significantly larger urine detection area than other clip
sensors. Your child will never misses a bedwetting accident! The
large sensor is ideal for boys and girls of all ages and holds
securely in place with Flexitape.


Safe and Effective Bedwetting Solution
Microprocessor controlled alarm is compact, discreet, weighs only
1oz. This bedwetting alarm offers 2-step shut off system - that
is your child needs to press the button and pull the cord. Your
fully awakened child will use the toilet to finish urinating.
Chummie Premium Bedwetting Alarm unit also detects when the
sensor is disconnected at night or when battery needs to be
replaced so you never have to discontinue treatment.


Free Smartphone App
Access the FREE Chummie Bedwetting Alarm Smartphone App from any
mobile phone or tablet to get help, special offers, watch
instructional videos, read FAQs, and contact support team with a
click.


Chummie premium bedwetting alarm comes with everything you need
to start your treatment tonight. The box contains compact alarm
unit, Intelliflex sensor, Flexitape and motivation reward system
to track your child's nightly progress and increase confidence
needed to stop bedwetting.


Award winning Chummie alarms are manufactured by Theos Medical
Systems, a leader in incontinence (Enuresis) management and
treatment.
feature_bullets: PATENTED ALERT TECHNOLOGY - Designed for deep sleepers; Unlike single tone alarms that may cause your child to get used to one tone, Chummie provides 8 different selectable tones, volume control, vibration settings and 2 bright lights to wake up deep sleepers

ONE DROP DETECTION SENSOR - Only Chummie alarms are powered with a soft, non-corrosive silicone sensor whose urine detection area is significantly larger than traditional clip sensors found in other bedwetting alarms; so you never miss a bedwetting accident again

COMFORT, CONVENIENCE AND VALUE - Compact alarm unit weighs just 1oz, IntelliFlex sensor takes body shape for maximum comfort and will not poke like some other sensors. Sensor can be reused within seconds by patting dry. Enhance comfort by using the Chummie Comfy-Armband (sold separately)

AWARD WINNING BEDWETTING SYSTEM - Chummie alarms are FDA registered, CE certified and are microprocessor controlled with advanced safety algorithms; Chummie Alarms have won numerous awards and are often recommended by pediatric urologists as the first line of bedwetting treatment
FREE MOBILE APP - Reach our award winning customer support with a click on your mobile phone or tablet, access online support, read FAQs, watch instructional videos and get live help

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
